display_long_description:
🐻 **Explore the Dreamlike World of Everwood**

Your loyal dog, Robin, has vanished! Embark on a thrilling journey to track him down through Everwood—a dreamlike world teeming with mystery, danger, and secrets.
[media]

🌲 **Escape Evil’s Clutches, Save the Wilderness**

The animals have been kidnapped, transformed into stuffed toys, and trapped in claw machines. Can you outsmart their captor and bring them home?
[media]

🧩 **Solve Puzzles & Outsmart the Wicked Dr. Kidd**

Crack tricky puzzles to sneak into Dr. Kidd’s secret labs and foil his dark experiments.
[media]

🚁 **Master the Claw in VR**

Take control of a high-tech drone claw to rescue animals trapped in claw machines. Precision is key!
[media]

🎮 **Escape in Platforming Challenges**

Guide rescued animals to safety through platforming levels with branching paths, dangerous obstacles, and sneaky dodging traps while collecting rewards.
[media]

🌱 **Restore Nature**

Every animal brings life back to Everwood, transforming the barren wilderness back into a thriving ecosystem!

[media]
🏆 **Compete, Collect & Conquer**

Rescue more than 40 animals, climb the global leaderboard.



**Key Features:**

✔ **Immersive VR Adventure** – Solve puzzles, rescue animals, and take down Dr. Kidd.

✔ **Cinematic Storytelling** – Unravel a gripping mystery while exploring an imaginative world.

✔ **Dynamic Claw Machine Mechanics** – Test your skills in virtual claw machine gameplay – with extra twists!

✔ **Puzzle Platforming** – Outsmart enemies and traps, discover secret escape routes, and find hidden rewards.

 🐻Are you ready to claw your way to freedom?🐻
